Write a function to compute a factorial:
```{r}
fact <- function(x){
  #' Calculate factorial 
  #' @param x number to get factorial of
  if (x>0){
  new=1
  for (i in x:1){
    new <- i*new
  }
  }else if (x==0){
    new=1
  } else new=(paste0("Error: You cannot take a factorial of ", x))
  return(new)
}
```
